title: can't get QT to build on OSX with phonon
body:
Summary

I'm trying to install py-pymol on a Mac (10.12).  It depends on py-pyqt, which depends on qt +phonon.  QT install fails, seems to be related to phonon, but I'm not 100% sure about that.  I don't typically work on Macs.

```console
$ spack install qt@4.8.6%clang@9.0.0-apple+dbus~examples~gtk~krellpatch~opengl patches=03f9893882c63a9a9617d9ecab9caf80661c96df13f596a9b24fc4579490144a,350cab888af92c24a3e4fc5dbdf7539f14cc0dd83fb1fe27c1340ba58cc9a507,c8a0fa819c8012a7cb70e902abb7133fc05235881ce230235d93719c47650c4e +phonon~webkit
```

Dependencies are all there:
```console
[+]  ytrdeoe      ^dbus@1.11.2%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  33my43f          ^expat@2.2.2%clang@9.0.0-apple~libbsd arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  7755w4m      ^freetype@2.7.1%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  dspzezl          ^bzip2@1.0.6%clang@9.0.0-apple+shared arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  b6j5xx4          ^libpng@1.6.34%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  cpdvq4e              ^zlib@1.2.11%clang@9.0.0-apple+optimize+pic+shared arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  uh4ub5t          ^pkgconf@1.4.0%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  om6r734      ^glib@2.56.0%clang@9.0.0-apple~libmount patches=c325997b72a205ad1638bb3e3ba0e5b73e3d32ce63b2d0d3282f3e3a2ff4663c tracing= arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  rnpmada          ^gettext@0.19.8.1%clang@9.0.0-apple+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2 patches=9acdb4e73f67c241b5ef32505c9ddf7cf6884ca8ea661692f21dca28483b04b8 +tar+xz arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  jnjhtzy              ^libxml2@2.9.4%clang@9.0.0-apple~python arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  vzhbdch                  ^xz@5.2.3%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  pleo2g2              ^ncurses@6.0%clang@9.0.0-apple patches=f84b2708a42777aadcc7f502a261afe10ca5646a51c1ef8b5e60d2070d926b57 ~symlinks~termlib arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  z7bs7bi              ^tar@1.29%clang@9.0.0-apple patches=08921fcbd732050c74ddf1de7d8ad95ffdbc09f8b4342456fa2f6a0dd02a957c,5c314db58d005043bf407abaf25eb9823b9032a22fd12a0b142d4bf548130fa4,d428578be7fb99b831eb61e53b8d88a859afe08b479a21238180899707d79ce4,e34d2470461037933737c0a60fbcc5d5ea905fefb6b414b4a2e88a440fcae23a arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  o6odmcn          ^libffi@3.2.1%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  zopqznk          ^pcre@8.41%clang@9.0.0-apple~jit+utf arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64

[+]  ytrmwn7              ^gdbm@1.14.1%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  na3ixeb                  ^readline@7.0%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  tb6hszp          ^python@2.7.14%clang@9.0.0-apple+dbm~optimizations patches=123082ab3483ded78e86d7c809e98a804b3465b4683c96bd79a2fd799f572244 +pic~shared+tk~ucs4 arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  fignamr              ^openssl@1.0.2n%clang@9.0.0-apple+systemcerts arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
[+]  o2wj6nw              ^sqlite@3.22.0%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64

[+]  7ywdk2j              ^libtiff@4.0.8%clang@9.0.0-apple arch=darwin-sierra-x86_64 
```

Error that seems to be relevant:
```console
In file included from ../../../3rdparty/phonon/qt7/quicktimevideoplayer.mm:18:
  >> 7694    ../../../3rdparty/phonon/qt7/quicktimevideoplayer.h:23:9: fatal error: 'QTKit/QTDataReference.h' file not fou
             nd
     7695    #import <QTKit/QTDataReference.h>
```

attaching spack-build.out
[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1947183/spack-build.out.txt)

And packages.yaml:

[packages.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1947190/packages.yaml.txt)

These links seem related:
https://github.com/jcfr/qt-easy-build/issues/27
https://github.com/PixarAnimationStudios/USD/issues/60
